pages.name: 重生儀式
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner#dusk)Ritual Diviner [Dusk]$(/l) for easier construction.
(Vampirism) Mobs within this range have their health syphoned to heal players in the Healing range. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: Full Range. $(li)Horizontal Radius: 20 $(li)Vertical Radius: 20
